item.title: More than 100 results using the search-job API in Splunk
item.description: If you’re using the @splunk/search-job API and want to return more than the 100 results (the default value), you’ll have to pass count to the getResults function, e.g.: new SearchJob.create({ search: myQuery, }).getResults({ count: 500 });
